name: Mahiro's Home Guard Duty
description:
Here is a game based off the Onimai Anime! Here you will play as Mahiro and perform by cleaning up the house and defending it from robbers and ghosts. (jumpscare warning)
You will have to use your flashlight to find enemies and blow your whistle to stop them!

If too many things are stolen or the house is too dirty you will have to try again!

Esc/Start - Pause

Z/A - Advance Text/ Use Item

X/X - Blow Whistle

C/B-Clean up

Cheat - press backspace 5 times to allow for more items to be stolen without a game over.
